com.sorcix.sirc

Interface ServerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IrcAdaptor

    public interface ServerListener
    Notified of server/channel changes. Some methods in this listener could be called due to us doing something, use User.isUs() to check if it was us.
    Author:
    Sorcix
    See Also:
    IrcConnection.addServerListener(ServerListener), IrcConnection.removeServerListener(ServerListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnect(IrcConnection irc)
      Connected to the server.
      void onDisconnect(IrcConnection irc)
      Disconnected from the server.
      void onInvite(IrcConnection irc, User sender, User user, Channel channel)
      Someone (possibly us) was invited into a channel.
      void onJoin(IrcConnection irc, Channel channel, User user)
      Someone (possibly us) joined a channel.
      void onKick(IrcConnection irc, Channel channel, User sender, User user, String msg)
      Someone (possibly us) was kicked from a channel.
      void onMode(IrcConnection irc, Channel channel, User sender, String mode)
      Someone (possibly us) changed a channel mode.
      void onMotd(IrcConnection irc, String motd)
      The server sent the Message of the Day.
      void onNick(IrcConnection irc, User oldUser, User newUser)
      Someone (possibly us) changed his nickname.
      void onPart(IrcConnection irc, Channel channel, User user, String message)
      Someone (possibly us) left a channel.
      void onQuit(IrcConnection irc, User user, String message)
      Someone quit the IRC server.
      void onTopic(IrcConnection irc, Channel channel, User sender, String topic)
      Someone (possibly us) changed the topic of a channel, or we joined a new channel and discovered the topic.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnect

        void onConnect(IrcConnection irc)
        Connected to the server.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.

      • onDisconnect

        void onDisconnect(IrcConnection irc)
        Disconnected from the server.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.

      • onInvite

        void onInvite(IrcConnection irc,
            User sender,
            User user,
            Channel channel)
        Someone (possibly us) was invited into a channel.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        sender - The user who invited someone.
        user - The user who was invited.
        channel - The channel the user was invited to.

      • onJoin

        void onJoin(IrcConnection irc,
          Channel channel,
          User user)
        Someone (possibly us) joined a channel.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        channel - The channel someone joined to.
        user - The user who joined.

      • onKick

        void onKick(IrcConnection irc,
          Channel channel,
          User sender,
          User user,
          String msg)
        Someone (possibly us) was kicked from a channel.

        Note: This method does NOT return a shared user object. That means that it isn't possible to retrieve the user prefix (or any modes).

        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        channel - The channel in which the user was kicked.
        sender - The user who kicked the user.
        user - The user who was kicked.

      • onMode

        void onMode(IrcConnection irc,
          Channel channel,
          User sender,
          String mode)
        Someone (possibly us) changed a channel mode.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        channel - The channel in which the mode was changed.
        sender - The user changing this mode.
        mode - The mode change.

      • onMotd

        void onMotd(IrcConnection irc,
          String motd)
        The server sent the Message of the Day.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        motd - The message of the day.
        Since:
        1.0.2
        See Also:
        IrcConnection.askMotd()

      • onNick

        void onNick(IrcConnection irc,
          User oldUser,
          User newUser)
        Someone (possibly us) changed his nickname. Note that the oldUser can not be used to send messages, as that nickname no longer exists.

        Note: This method does NOT return a shared user object. That means that it isn't possible to retrieve the user prefix (or any modes).

        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        oldUser - The old user nickname.
        newUser - The new user nickname.

      • onPart

        void onPart(IrcConnection irc,
          Channel channel,
          User user,
          String message)
        Someone (possibly us) left a channel.

        Note: This method does NOT return a shared user object. That means that it isn't possible to retrieve the user prefix (or any modes).

        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        channel - The channel someone parted from.
        user - The user who parted.
        message - The part message, or null.

      • onQuit

        void onQuit(IrcConnection irc,
          User user,
          String message)
        Someone quit the IRC server.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        user - The user who quit.
        message - The quit message, or null.

      • onTopic

        void onTopic(IrcConnection irc,
           Channel channel,
           User sender,
           String topic)
        Someone (possibly us) changed the topic of a channel, or we joined a new channel and discovered the topic. The sender will be null when we discovered the topic after joining.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection receiving this event.
        channel - The channel in which the topic was changed.
        sender - The user who changed the topic, or null.
        topic - The new topic.
